global.external_link_text: You are about to leave our app to view a link, do you want to continue?

fileupload.heading: Upload File
fileupload.description: Uploading a file will store your file on the IPFS blockchain and automatically send the file in chat.

loading.long_load: This is taking a bit, do you have {text} installed?
loading.other_tab: Still loading? Satellite may already be open in another tab.
loading.alpha: This is an alpha product, Please use Goerli Testnet!

files.heading: Files
files.subtext: Browse files you've shared with other users, and upload new files to IPFS.
files.your_files_subtext: Below is a list of all of the files you've uploaded.

friends.heading: Friends
friends.subtext: Get connected with other people on the Satellite platform.
friends.enter_address: Enter a friends Ethereum address below to find them...
friends.start_chat: Start a chat with your friends below, be kind, or don't.Â We don't judge.
friends.no_friends: Oops, you don't have any friends yet. We'll be your friend, but you can also add more above.
friends.your_address_desc: Share this address so your friends can add you.

main.heading: Liftoff!
main.subtext_one: You're in orbit and ready to go.
main.subtext_two: Add some friends and get chatting, sharing and streaming!

PWA.prompt_desc: Quickly install our app on your phone for a seemless experience, it's really easy!

accounts.label: Accounts
accounts.heading: Active Account
accounts.subtext: Select with Ethereum acccount you'd prefer to default transactions from.
accounts.gas_price_desc: Higher gas prices will transact faster.

audio_video.label: Audio
audio_video.input_subtext: Select which input device you'd like people to hear your silky smooth voice from.
audio_video.audio_output_subtext: Select the device that you'd like to deliver sound to your ear holes with.
audio_video.audio_bitrate_subtext: Higher bitrates will transmit better quality audio, lowering the bitrate can help with slower connection speeds.
audio_video.sample_size_subtext: A higher sample size will give you a broader dynamic range of audio. Higher samples will require better connection speeds.
audio_video.echo_cancellation_subtext: Enable to help cancel out some slight echo & feedback from your mic.
audio_video.noise_supression_subtext: Enable to help hide background noise in your environment.
audio_video.opus: Satellite uses the Opus Codec, and open source audio codec.
audio_video.video_subtext: Select which video device you'd like to share your beautiful smile from.

keybinds.label: Keybinds
keybinds.heading: Default Keybinds
keybinds.subtext: Below are a list of the current keybinds, right now they are not configurable.

network.label: Network
network.heading: Web3 Provider
network.subtext: A Web3 provider is simply the way you chose to interact with the blockchain. For most people Default is fine.

personalize.theme_subtext: Change up the theam and stay easy on the eyes with Satellite.
personalize.notifications_subtext: Click to enable notifications with Satellite for a better experience.
personalize.language_subtext: Choose your preferred language from the list below.

storage.threadDB: Satellite utilizes Texile's ThreadDB, a decentralized database, to store your data.
storage.threadDB_learn_more: You can learn more about them here:
storage.threadDB_enable:
Enable ThreadDB, a decentralized database used to recieve offline messaging and unlock additional features.
Your data is stored on a distributed network and none of that data passes through us.
storage.threadDB_data_id_text: Your data ID references all the data stored in the app. Save this somewhere save to transfer your data to another browser.
storage.lfs_subtext: Click to enable large file storage, this will allow you to upload very large files and keep more message history cached.
storage.export_ls_subtext: Export your Local Storage to move to another browser.
storage.data_subtext: Quickly clean up locally stored data, please be aware doing so will clear your stored files, message history, and more.
storage.data_subtext_two: Only do this if you know the repercussions.

profile.label: Profile
profile.heading: Setup Account
profile.subtext: Your account is not setup yet, let's get that going! It only takes a moment.
profile.step2: Please wait while your transaction is sent...
profile.step3: Don't Leave! we're waiting for a confirmation...
profile.step4: We're just taking care of some last minute things...
profile.edit_account_subtext: Browse your account info, and make changes.
profile.your_account_subtext: Browse your account info, and make changes.
profile.id_card: This is like your ID card, share this with friends so they can add you.
profile.name: Name
profile.disclaimer: Your profile is stored on an Ethereum Smart Contract. A decentralized transfer protocol free from fraudulent manipulation.

contracts.audit_disclaimer:
These are Alpha contracts and have not been audited yet
It's worth noting these contracts are built to be funcitional proof of concepts, not performant, and will be re-written pre beta.
contracts.label: Contracts
contracts.heading: Browse Contracts

encryption.label: Encryption & Keys
encryption.heading: Public / Private Keys
encryption.subtext: Messages are encrypted with a public and private key. You can reveal your keys below. DO NOT share your private key with others.

sidebar.add_friends: Hey! Add some more friends to chat

controls.media_stream_active: Media stream active, click to view

quickfriends.no_friends_yet: You haven't added any friends yet.

alpha_release.warning: Heads up, this is an alpha release. Messages are not yet encrypted. This is not a finished product and serval exploits may exist. Features are rapidly being added and changed. For this reason please only use this on a Testnet until the beta.

conversation.no_conversation_subtext: Say something and get the conversation started.

audio.not_supported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

video.not_supported: Your browser does not support the video element.

message_body.lost_keys: Keys changed or are missing, unable to decrypt

error.title: That's a bug.
error.text: You encountered a bug, if you'd like to report it all the info you need is below.

create.heading: Create a Server
create.photo_text: Give your server a face. Chose a memorable photo to show it's members.
create.confirm_transaction: We're setting up your new server, please confirm any transactions.
create.waiting_server_confirmation: We're waiting for your server to confirm...

unlock.AES_encryption: Pin stored with AES encryption using Web Crypto.

web3.provider_suggestion: If you do not have a Ethereum provider installed, please consider installing MetaMask.

provider_selection.heading: Pick Your Poison
provider_selection.subtext: Choose the provider you want to use. Choosing Satellite.im will create a new wallet, just for you.

0.heading: Wallet creation
0.subtext: We're going to create a blockchain wallet for you. This wallet controls your account and information associated to it, so be sure to back it up!

1.heading: Recovery phrase
1.subtext: Please store these words somewhere safe so you can recover your account in the future.

2.heading: Phrase check
2.subtext: Write the missing words in the right position before to continue
